article: One summer evening, a 10-year-old boy was trying to hit a bottle with a slingshot . The bottle was about 7 to 8 meters  _  . The boy tried many times but he couldn't hit it. His mother just  kept  passing him small stones. A girl walked by. She  watched  the boy for some time and said to his mother, "Let me show  _  how to shoot." "No, thank you," said the  _  . "He is blind ." The girl was surprised and asked, "How can he hit the bottle  _  ?" "I tell him he can do it," said the mother, "  _  he tries hard enough." The little boy tried again and again. The mother always told him that he was doing  _  than before. The boy became more confident. After a long time, it  _  dark. The girl said goodbye to the mother and the son. When she turned to leave, she heard a stone hit the  _  . The little boy finally made it! With confidence and patience, nothing is impossible.
